title: ChemicalSubstance
description: A chemical substance is 'a portion of matter of constant composition, composed of molecular entities of the same type or of different types' (source: [ChEBI:59999](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/chebi/searchId.do?chebiId=59999)).

chemicalRole.description: A role played by the BioChemEntity within a chemical context.

chemicalComposition.description: The chemical composition describes the identity and relative ratio of the chemical elements that make up the substance.

potentialUse.description: Intended use of the BioChemEntity by humans.
